EmailTemplate.subject: Supply Desk Sensitive Data Processing Consent Form - Response Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!TR1__Associated_Qualification__c.TR1__Contact__c}
Please find attached Supply Desk's Sensitive Information Consent Form.
Under GDPR regulations we are required to gain consent every 18 months to process and retain this information.
Therefore we would appreciate it, if you would complete the attached form and return it within the next 10 working days so we may update our records.
Please do not hesitate to contact the compliance team if you require any assistance or have any questions.
Kind Regards
The Compliance Team
complianceteam@supplydesk.co.uk
